name: Outlook Clean up & styling
description: This is an alternative to my popular Outlook clean up. This just adds a little style to outlook. Gives the solid boring colored top a nice mixed color and changes the whole overall background of the panes to a slight off yellow. That particular part is still only testing, but seems to work correctly on my outlook.
additional_info:
added background image as base64 to lessen internet traffic from your computer. its just a 20/06/2013: small 47kb jpg image now. 

25/06/2013: fixed Actions button. Apologies to the person who wrote and said it wasn't working, i never noticed lol. Its working again now.

28/06/2013: fixed actions button when mail expanded.

12/07/2013: fixed the footer bar getting in the way of the buttons causing them to not work at the very bottom of page.
